articles.title: Russian tank attack in eastern Ukraine kills 2 Americans, Canadian and Swede - POLITICO
articles.description: U.S. citizens Luke “Skywalker” Lucyszyn and Bryan Young were killed when they were ambushed during a special operation in eastern Ukraine, their commander said.

articles.author: Kevin Dotson and Sana Noor Haq, CNN
articles.title: Sydney McLaughlin breaks her own 400-meter hurdles world record - CNN
articles.description: American runner Sydney McLaughlin broke her own 400-meter hurdles world record to take gold on Friday night at the World Athletics Championships in Eugene, Oregon.

articles.author: Alex Shahini
articles.title: Flex Automotive make the ultimate retro-inspired Toyota Land Cruisers - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: Japanese SUV retrofitter Flex Automotive, who offers conversions of Toyota Land Cruisers with a nostalgic twist have now branched out into America and intend on promoting a novel culture for enthusiasts on the new continent.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: American Norman wins world 400m gold, SA's Van Niekerk finishes 5th - News24
articles.description: American Michael Norman made up for a disappointing fifth-placed finish at the Tokyo Olympics by winning the world 400m gold in Eugene on Friday.
articles.content:
American Michael Norman made up for a disappointing fifth-placed finish at the Tokyo Olympics by winning the world 400m gold in Eugene on Friday.

articles.title: Fireball sighting over Indiana confirmed by American Meteor Society - IndyStar
articles.description: Over 100 eyewitnesses reported seeing the fireball to the American Meteor Society. It likely lasted between three and five seconds.
articles.content:
It's a bird! It's a plane!
It's actually not, and it's not Superman. It's a fireball.
